Class InvoiceManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • InvoiceManagement

  • public class InvoiceManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is to manage and perform operation on the single or multiple invoices.
    Version:
    Final
    Author:
    Cyril Thomas

    • Method Detail

      • getInvoiceSingle

        public Invoice getInvoiceSingle(int newInvoiceID)
        This Method is used to Call a Single Invoice by the Invoice ID Number.
        Parameters:
        newInvoiceID - : Accept A Single Invoice ID and Pass it to Invoice JDBC Class getSingleInvoiceFromJDBC(newInvoiceID)
        Returns:
        singleInvoices : Returns a Single Invoice back to the Caller.

      • getInvoiceList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Invoice> getInvoiceList(int select,
                                          int Days)
        This Method is used to Call an Array List of Invoices.
        Parameters:
        select - : An integer parameter to pass the value to JDBC getInvoiceList(select,days). Allowed Values For Select are: (1) select = 1 For Returning All The invoices in database. (2) select = 2 For Returning Pending Invoices (3) select = 3 For Returning Paid Invoices. (4) select = 4 For Returning paid Invoices Older than the Current Days. Used in combination with the Parameter Days.
        Days - : An integer parameter to hold days used in combination when Parameter select = 4.
        Returns:
        InvoiceList : Returns an Array List of Invoices.

      • createInvoices

        public int createInvoices(java.lang.String newDate)
        This methods creates Invoices from Orders Database
        Parameters:
        newDate - : Accept String Date in format of "yyyy-MM-dd" and pass that value to JDBC Create Invoice Method
        Returns:
        rowsInt : Returns the # of new Rows which are Invoices Created.

      • updateInvoice

        public boolean updateInvoice(Invoice newInvoice)
        This method updates existing values of an already existing Invoices.
        Parameters:
        newInvoice - : Accepts a single Invoice Object with values that are passed to JDBC Update Class.
        Returns:
        boolean : true if successful or false if the update fails.

      • deleteInvoice

        public int deleteInvoice(int Days)
        This method deletes Older Invoices determined by how old the paid dates of the Invoices are.
        Parameters:
        Days - : Integer Days that is used to determine old invoices and pass the value to JDBC Delete method.
        Returns:
        rowsaffected: Returns how many Invoices where deleted
